titles.title: CSRS Retirement Repayment Technical Correction Act of 2009
To amend title 5, United States Code, to exempt certain repayments under the Civil Service Retirement System from the requirement that they be made with interest.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform, and in addition to the Committee on House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Oversight and Government Reform
